FuncDef:
The http-redirect-profile command run in the system view creates an HTTP redirection template or displays the HTTP redirection template view.
The undo http-redirect-profile command deletes an HTTP redirection template.
By default, no HTTP redirection template is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an HTTP redirection template.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After a device uses up service quotas, it references an HTTP redirection template containing HTTP redirection parameters to redirect services using HTTP. To configure an HTTP redirection template, run the http-redirect-profile command.
Configuration Impact
If no HTTP redirection template is configured, running the http-redirect-profile command creates one. If an HTTP redirection template is configured, running the http-redirect-profile command displays the HTTP redirection template view.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
